alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 14 at 1:30AM CDT until July 19 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arkansas and west central Arkansas, including the following counties, in northwest Arkansas, Benton, Carroll, Crawford, Madison and Washington AR. In west central Arkansas, Franklin. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall will continue to develop across portions of northeast Oklahoma and northwest Arkansas. Rainfall amounts up to 5 inches will be possible in a few areas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington
